attributes.description: This dashboard provides operational visibility into Kafka replica health, ISR changes, and replication performance.

params.markdown:
### Replica manager

This dashboard provides visibility into the replica management layer of Kafka clusters.

- Tracks replication health through under-replicated partitions, offline replicas, and In-Sync Replicas (ISR) stability.
- Provides insight into partition and leader distribution across brokers.
- Monitors ISR operations, including expansion, shrinkage, and failed updates over time.
- Surfaces replica fetcher health and performance metrics, including lag and fetch rates.
